testCases.label: Add Numbers
testCases.description: Verifies that add_numbers correctly returns the sum of two integers.

testCases.label: Subtract Numbers
testCases.description: Verifies that subtract_numbers correctly subtracts the second integer from the first.

testCases.label: Multiply Numbers
testCases.description: Ensures multiply_numbers returns the product of two integers.

testCases.label: Divide Numbers
testCases.description: Checks that divide_numbers performs valid division and returns the result.

testCases.label: Divide by Zero
testCases.description: Ensures divide_numbers raises a ValueError when attempting division by zero.

testCases.label: Modulus Numbers
testCases.description: Verifies that modulus_numbers correctly returns the remainder of a division operation.

testCases.label: Modulus by Zero
testCases.description: Ensures modulus_numbers raises a ValueError when attempting modulus by zero.
